Text: The Daily Howler is an American political blog written by Bob Somerby.

<Text: The Daily Howler:  It was perhaps the first major political blog, started in 1998.>

Text: The Daily Howler:  The style is by turns earnest and sarcastic.

Text: The Daily Howler:  In his view, the media frequently latch on to a generally agreed "script" with little regard for facts that contradict the script.
Triplets:<The Daily Howler

Text: The Daily Howler:  Despite being left of center in his politics, Somerby mainly critiques liberals in the U.S. mainstream media who he feels do poor journalism, such as Rachel Maddow and Keith Olbermann, both of MSNBC.
